environment_variables.name: SELF_HOSTED
environment_variables.description: Indicates whether the application is self-hosted (true/false).

environment_variables.name: RAILS_FORCE_SSL
environment_variables.description: Determines if SSL should be forced (true/false).

environment_variables.name: GOOD_JOB_EXECUTION_MODE
environment_variables.description: Sets the execution mode for GoodJob (e.g., async).

environment_variables.name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
environment_variables.description: Secret key used for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

environment_variables.name: DB_HOST
environment_variables.description: Hostname for the PostgreSQL database service.

environment_variables.name: POSTGRES_DB
environment_variables.description: PostgreSQL database to be created and used by the application.

environment_variables.name: POSTGRES_USER
environment_variables.description: Username for connecting to the PostgreSQL database.

before_install.en_us:
### Additional Instructions:
Generate the app secret key:

  1. Open a terminal and digit:

  ```bash
  head -c 64 /dev/urandom | od -An -tx1 | tr -d ' \n' && echo
  ```
  2. Copy the generated key and paste it in the `SECRET_KEY_BASE`.

  3. Save the changes and restart the application.

For more information, refer to the [official documentation](https://maybe.co)
